info.description: Use these REST APIs for performing operations on User entity in Azure API Management deployment. The User entity in API Management represents the developers that call the APIs of the products to which they are subscribed.
info.title: ApiManagementClient

get.description: Lists a collection of registered users in the specified service instance.

parameters.description: The name of the resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: The name of the API Management service.
parameters.name: serviceName

parameters.description:
| Field            | Supported operators    | Supported functions               |
|------------------|------------------------|-----------------------------------|
| id               | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| firstName        | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| lastName         | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| email            | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| state            | eq                     | N/A                               |
| registrationDate | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | N/A                               |
| note             | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |

schema.description: Parameters supplied to the Create User operation.

email.description: Email address. Must not be empty and must be unique within the service instance.

note.description: Optional note about a user set by the administrator.

state.description: Account state. Specifies whether the user is active or not. Blocked users are unable to sign into the developer portal or call any APIs of subscribed products. Default state is Active.

post.description: Retrieves a redirection URL containing an authentication token for signing a given user into the developer portal.

200.description: Lists a collection of Group entities.

count.description: Total record count number across all pages.

builtIn.description: true if the group is one of the three system groups (Administrators, Developers, or Guests); otherwise false.

description.description: Group description. Can contain HTML formatting tags.

externalId.description: For external groups, this property contains the id of the group from the external identity provider, e.g. for Azure Active Directory aad://<tenant>.onmicrosoft.com/groups/<group object id>; otherwise the value is null.

id.description: Uniquely identifies the group within the current API Management service instance. The value is a valid relative URL in the format of /groups/{groupid} where {groupid} is a group identifier.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: Service-defined error code. This code serves as a sub-status for the HTTP error code specified in the response.

details.description: The list of invalid fields send in request, in case of validation error.

code.description: Property level error code.

get.description: Lists the collection of subscriptions of the specified user.

parameters.description: The name of the resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: The name of the API Management service.
parameters.name: serviceName

parameters.description: User identifier. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance.
parameters.name: uid

parameters.description:
| Field        | Supported operators    | Supported functions                         |
|--------------|------------------------|---------------------------------------------|
| id           | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| name         | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| stateComment | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| userId       | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| productId    | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| state        | eq                     |                                             |
parameters.name: $filter

parameters.description: Number of records to return.
parameters.name: $top

parameters.description: Number of records to skip.
parameters.name: $skip

parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.
parameters.name: api-version

parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

200.description: Lists a collection of Subscription entities.

count.description: Total record count number across all pages.

createdDate.description: Subscription creation date. The date conforms to the following format: `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ` as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.

endDate.description: Date when subscription was cancelled or expired. The date conforms to the following format: `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ` as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.

expirationDate.description: Subscription expiration date. The date conforms to the following format: `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ` as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.

id.description: Uniquely identifies the subscription within the current API Management service instance. The value is a valid relative URL in the format of /subscriptions/{sid} where {sid} is a subscription identifier.

name.description: The name of the subscription, or null if the subscription has no name.

notificationDate.description: Upcoming subscription expiration notification date. The date conforms to the following format: `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ` as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.

productId.description: The product resource identifier of the subscribed product. The value is a valid relative URL in the format of /products/{productId} where {productId} is a product identifier.

startDate.description: Subscription activation date. The date conforms to the following format: `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ` as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.

state.description: Subscription state. Possible states are * active  the subscription is active, * suspended  the subscription is blocked, and the subscriber cannot call any APIs of the product, * submitted  the subscription request has been made by the developer, but has not yet been approved or rejected, * rejected  the subscription request has been denied by an administrator, * cancelled  the subscription has been cancelled by the developer or administrator, * expired  the subscription reached its expiration date and was deactivated.

stateComment.description: Optional subscription comment added by an administrator.

userId.description: The user resource identifier of the subscription owner. The value is a valid relative URL in the format of /users/{uid} where {uid} is a user identifier.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: Service-defined error code. This code serves as a sub-status for the HTTP error code specified in the response.

details.description: The list of invalid fields send in request, in case of validation error.

code.description: Property level error code.

post.description: Gets the Shared Access Authorization Token for the User.

parameters.description: The name of the resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: The name of the API Management service.
parameters.name: serviceName

parameters.description: User identifier. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance.
parameters.name: uid

parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.
parameters.name: api-version

parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

200.description: The response body contains the authorization token for the user.

value.description: Shared Access Authorization token for the User.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: Service-defined error code. This code serves as a sub-status for the HTTP error code specified in the response.

details.description: The list of invalid fields send in request, in case of validation error.

code.description: Property level error code.

schema.description: Parameters supplied to the Get User Token operation.

expiry.description: The Expiry time of the Token. Maximum token expiry time is set to 30 days. The date conforms to the following format: `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ` as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.

keyType.description: The Key to be used to generate token for user.

GenerateSsoUrlResult.description: Generate SSO Url operations response details.

value.description: Redirect Url containing the SSO URL value.

count.description: Total record count number across all pages.

registrationDate.description: Date of user registration. The date conforms to the following format: `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ` as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.
Date of user registration. The date conforms to the following format: `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ` as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.

UserCreateParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Create User operation.

email.description: Email address. Must not be empty and must be unique within the service instance.

note.description: Optional note about a user set by the administrator.

state.description: Account state. Specifies whether the user is active or not. Blocked users are unable to sign into the developer portal or call any APIs of subscribed products. Default state is Active.

UserIdentityCollection.description: List of Users Identity list representation.

UserTokenParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Get User Token operation.

expiry.description: The Expiry time of the Token. Maximum token expiry time is set to 30 days. The date conforms to the following format: `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ` as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.

keyType.description: The Key to be used to generate token for user.

value.description: Shared Access Authorization token for the User.

UserUpdateParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Update User operation.

UserIdParameter.description: User identifier. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance.
UserIdParameter.name: uid
